FuncDef: This optional command specifies the number of attempts software should make to re-establish the LSP after it has failed LSP. After each successful attempt, the counter is reset to zero.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of times software will attempt to re-establish the LSP after it has failed. Allowed values are integers in the range of 0 to 10000. Values-0 to 10000.
